issues.title: [Chore] Drop old packages support
issues.author: xepozz
issues.summary: Drop support for old package versions that support PHP 7 and 8.0, keeping only the minimal bounds that meet the PHP >8.1 requirement. This includes removing old versions of internal/promise, nesbot/carbon, and symfony packages.

issues.title: [Bug] Minimal Composer requirements conflicts with react/promise v2
issues.author: xepozz
issues.summary: PHP SDK's minimal Composer requirements conflict with react/promise v2, causing CI pipeline failures when installing lowest dependency versions. The issue stems from Composer ^2.9 being unable to install the composer/composer ^2.8 API package needed for internal/promise 2.* versions.

issues.title: [Bug] Temporal PHP SDK doing its own extension check, breaking composer's `--ignore-platform-reqs`
issues.author: adepretis
issues.summary: The Temporal PHP SDK performs runtime checks for the gRPC extension instead of declaring it as a composer dependency, breaking installations with `--ignore-platform-reqs` and causing failures during Laravel's package discovery process.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Symfony 8.0 support
issues.author: xepozz
issues.summary: Request to add support for Symfony 8.0 packages in the PHP SDK. Currently, the SDK's composer.json specifies compatibility with Symfony 5.4, 6.4, and 7.0, but excludes 8.0 versions.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Implement `SetCurrentDetails` for dynamic workflow details
issues.author: FluffyDiscord
issues.summary: PHP SDK lacks a way to dynamically set workflow details from within the workflow itself, a capability that other Temporal SDKs support.

issues.title: [php] Plugin + SimplePlugin
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Implement a plugin system for the PHP SDK to allow users to create custom integrations with Temporal Workflows, similar to the existing Python implementation.

issues.title: Bug Report: Class "Grpc\ChannelCredentials" not found in Laravel/Artisan Context
issues.author: designbyjr
issues.summary: gRPC ChannelCredentials class is not found when accessing Temporal SDK through Laravel Artisan commands, despite the gRPC extension being properly loaded in direct PHP CLI. The issue appears to be related to Laravel's service container or autoloader interaction rather than the SDK itself.

issues.title: [Bug] upsertTypedSearchAttributes in test server
issues.author: Norbytus
issues.summary: Workflow::upsertTypedSearchAttributes causes test timeout when called inside a workflow. The user suspects search attributes may not be supported by the test server.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Reclassify Benign Application errors in OpenTelemetry
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Feature request to reclassify benign application errors in OpenTelemetry traces for the PHP SDK, referencing a related Python SDK issue for implementation guidance.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Plugin support
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add plugin support to the PHP SDK, as described in the cross-repository features issue #652.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add first execution run ID to workflow info
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add first execution run ID to workflow info in PHP SDK. The feature request seeks to expose the first execution run ID through the workflow info object, allowing workflows to access the run ID of their initial execution.

issues.title: [üêõ BUG]: undefined method ScopeContext::all()
issues.author: quipo
issues.summary: User attempted to call `Workflow::all()` on promises but the method doesn't exist on ScopeContext. They were using an incorrect API‚Äîthe correct method is `Promise::all()` which they discovered through discussion.

issues.title: Enable `Discussions`
issues.author: ruudk
issues.summary: Request to enable GitHub Discussions feature for the PHP SDK repository to provide a dedicated space for questions and help requests separate from issue tracking.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add Summary to LocalActivityOptions
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Feature request to add a Summary field to LocalActivityOptions in the PHP SDK. Refers to a related issue in the features repository for additional context.

issues.title: [Bug] Suppressed exception in worfklow child
issues.author: root-aza
issues.summary: PayloadConverter exceptions from child workflows and continue-as-new operations are being suppressed and not visible in logs or Temporal UI, making it impossible to debug serialization failures. Exceptions need to be properly propagated so they can be sent to error tracking systems like Sentry.

issues.title: [Bug] Memory leak workflow worker
issues.author: root-aza
issues.summary: PHP SDK workflow worker experiences significant memory leaks when workflows are repeatedly restarted via UI, potentially consuming multiple gigabytes of memory and creating zombie processes.

issues.title: [Bug] Abandoned Child Workflows Cancellation policy
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Abandoned child workflows should not receive a cascading cancellation from their parent workflow. This aligns with Temporal's child workflow cancellation policy where abandoned children should be independent.

issues.title: [Bug] Unexpected failures and hanging workflows under high concurrency in parent-child workflows with signals
issues.author: igancev
issues.summary: Under high-concurrency conditions (2000+ workflows), the PHP SDK experiences unexpected workflow failures and signal handling issues. Child workflows fail to complete or remain suspended despite proper signal logic, with type conversion errors and undefined request responses.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Apply application failure logging and metrics behaviour according to ApplicationErrorCategory
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Implement application failure logging and metrics behavior in the PHP SDK according to ApplicationErrorCategory, following the pattern established in core SDKs. The PHP SDK needs to apply corresponding logging behavior while core handles metrics.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Environment Configuration
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Feature request to implement environment configuration support in the PHP SDK, following the external client configuration proposal and features issue #441.

issues.title: [Bug] Incorrect timer cancellation when workflow worker is down
issues.author: faim87
issues.summary: When a workflow with an active timer is cancelled while the worker is restarting, the timer cancellation fails with a BadCancelTimerAttributes error, leaving the workflow in a Running state until WorkflowExecutionTimeout is reached instead of properly handling the cancellation.

issues.title: [Bug] Facade methods throw wrong exception
issues.author: mtorromeo
issues.summary: Facade methods throw RuntimeException instead of the documented OutOfContextException when called from wrong context. The OutOfContextException class appears to be unused in the codebase.

issues.title: [Feature Request] In test env - I can't unserialize object structure
issues.author: agoalofalife
issues.summary: ActivityMocker in PHP SDK doesn't properly serialize/deserialize DTO structures during testing because it's created without a custom converter for RoadRunnerActivityInvocationCache. User reports mocked activities fail to unserialize passed objects.

issues.title: [Bug] return type mismatch in Workflow::getInfo()
issues.author: root-aza
issues.summary: Calling Workflow::getInfo() from within an ActivityInboundInterceptor causes a type mismatch error. The method is decorated with a return type hint expecting WorkflowInfo, but returns ActivityInfo in activity context, causing a PHP TypeError.

issues.title: [Bug] Don`t serialize return artivity method boolean and void types.
issues.author: stargazer-team
issues.summary: Activity methods with boolean return types were failing with a type conversion error during serialization. The issue was caused by incorrect activity method configuration in the workflow code, not a SDK bug.

issues.title: Resolve protobuf deprecations
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: The protobuf package has introduced a new RepeatedField class and deprecated the old one. The PHP SDK needs to resolve all protobuf deprecations to maintain compatibility with newer versions.

issues.title: [Bug] Using `getVersion` break determinism
issues.author: cv65kr
issues.summary: User attempted to use `Workflow::getVersion()` for workflow versioning but encountered a determinism error. The root cause was that `getVersion()` returns a promise and requires `yield` to properly resolve.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflows with promoted properties fails on 2.14.0 sdk version
issues.author: rmikalkenas
issues.summary: Workflows with PHP 8.4 promoted properties fail in SDK 2.14.0 when the workflow method has arguments, causing those arguments to incorrectly propagate to the workflow constructor instead of the workflow method.

issues.title: [Bug] PHP API DOC link isn't working
issues.author: StanQ1
issues.summary: A link to the PHP API documentation was broken and not functional. The issue was reported with a screenshot showing the problem, and the link has since been fixed on the website.

issues.title: [php] SDK support for activity reset
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to add SDK support for activity reset functionality in the PHP SDK, as documented in the features repository issue #620.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Warn when the server-provided task start time is fairly different than time SDK begins processing the task
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to warn when the server-provided task start time differs significantly from when the SDK begins processing the task. This helps detect timing discrepancies that may indicate synchronization issues.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Show retry policy on activity info
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to display retry policy information on activity info in the PHP SDK. References feature request #615 from the features repository.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose `WorkflowInboundCallInterceptor::init()`
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Request to expose the `init()` method in `WorkflowInboundCallInterceptor` for the PHP SDK, following the pattern already implemented in the Java SDK.

issues.title: [Bug] Request to Remove @internal Annotation from WorkflowExecutionDescription or Provide Alternative Access
issues.author: yourmaze
issues.summary: User requested removal of @internal annotation from WorkflowExecutionDescription class to allow external access to WorkflowExecutionInfo and WorkflowExecutionStatus. The class contains critical execution state information but is currently blocked from public usage.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow::asyncDetached memory leak
issues.author: KorDum
issues.summary: Workflow::asyncDetached causes memory leaks when used without proper await/yield constructs, leaving orphaned requests in memory after workflow completion. The issue occurs because Client instances storing requests aren't properly cleaned up when the detached scope ends.

issues.title: [Bug] MarshallingRule marked as internal
issues.author: KorDum
issues.summary: MarshallingRule class is marked as internal, preventing users from implementing custom marshalling types using RuleFactoryInterface. Static analyzers flag this as an internal API access violation.

issues.title: [Bug] Incorrect generic extends of RuleFactoryInterface
issues.author: KorDum
issues.summary: RuleFactoryInterface incorrectly declares a generic type parameter that it doesn't actually define, causing PHPStan errors when implementing classes try to specify their own generic types. The interface extends TypeInterface<mixed> but RuleFactoryInterface itself is not generic, creating a template type conflict.

issues.title: [Docs] Document SDK marshaller
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Documentation for the PHP SDK marshaller is completely missing, making it difficult for new users to learn how to serialize data objects and typed lists. Additionally, the relationship between marshallers and DataConverters is unclear, and there are undocumented quirks like constructor promotion not working as expected.

issues.title: Heartbeating activities should be interrupted when the activities are paused.
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Activities with heartbeating should be interrupted when the activities are paused. This is a coordination issue between the activity execution lifecycle and pause mechanism in the PHP SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Serialization context for codecs and converters
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add serialization context for codecs and converters in the PHP SDK, enabling better control over serialization behavior. This is a cross-SDK feature initiative referenced in the features repository.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support New Worker Versioning API
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Add support for the new Worker Versioning API in PHP SDK through annotations. This involves implementing workflow annotations similar to Python and .NET SDKs to enable the versioning features.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Make Destroyable interface public
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Request to make the Destroyable interface public so developers can define custom memory cleanup rules when workflows are unloaded from memory.

issues.title: Set Temporal-Namespace header on every gRPC request
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: PHP SDK should set the Temporal-Namespace header on every gRPC request, as specified in the features repository specification.

issues.title: Initial Nexus implementation - PHP
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Implement Nexus support in the PHP SDK to enable cross-workflow and cross-SDK communication. This is part of the broader Nexus feature rollout across all Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: [DX] Unexpected behaviour with lax DateInterval string parsing
issues.author: jackprice
issues.summary: CarbonInterval::fromString() used for parsing DateInterval strings is too lenient and silently drops components (e.g., 'P2M' becomes 2 minutes instead of 2 months), causing unexpected behavior compared to PHP's DateInterval. Needs documentation clarification and potentially stricter parsing with warnings.

issues.title: [Bug] Can't run the tests of UpdateMethod
issues.author: agpopov
issues.summary: UpdateMethod tests fail with null result assertion in PHP SDK's test service, while signals work correctly. The issue appears to be that the Test Server may not properly support workflow updates, with results not being returned to callers.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose root workflow execution
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose the root workflow execution in the PHP SDK, dependent on a prior Go SDK release and a features repository proposal.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Built-in query responses should use "RawValue"
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to ensure built-in query responses use RawValue for consistency with the features specification. This is a follow-up to issue #574 implementation.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support "RawValue" non-converted values
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to implement support for a RawValue payload wrapper that allows converters to skip conversion and pass values unchanged, similar to the feature being added across Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: [Bug] WorkerFactoryInterface seems to be missing arguments for newWorker() method
issues.author: vansante
issues.summary: WorkerFactoryInterface method signature is missing parameters that are present in the actual implementation (ExceptionInterceptorInterface and PipelineProvider), causing a mismatch between the public interface contract and implementation.

issues.title: [Bug] Very rare nondeterministic error
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Rare nondeterministic workflow errors occur when activity scheduling commands are lost during event processing, causing workflow replay failures with 'extra replay command' errors. The issue appears to involve complex interactions between the PHP SDK, RoadRunner, and the Temporal Go SDK event handling pipeline.

issues.title: [Question] How to debug the activity task startToClose timeout error?
issues.author: ArFeRR
issues.summary: PHP SDK activity task hangs after completion and doesn't return until startToClose timeout (3 minutes) expires, triggering retry policy. The activity executes successfully but then hangs, causing all retry attempts to also timeout.

issues.title: Expose Workflow cancel cause/reason
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: The WorkflowExecutionCancelRequestedEventAttributes.cause field should be exposed to workflows when they receive cancels. Additionally, this cause should be exposed as an input parameter when users initiate cancels from clients or issue cancel commands.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Stop registering magic methods as Activity methods
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Request to prevent magic methods like constructors from being automatically registered as Activity methods in the PHP SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support Priority Annotations
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Request to add support for attaching priority to workflows and activities in the PHP SDK, following the feature specification defined in the features repository.

issues.title: Add `Patched()` and `DeprecatePatch()` APIs
issues.author: mjameswh
issues.summary: Request to add `Patched()` and `DeprecatePatch()` APIs to the PHP SDK for versioning support, following the implementation pattern from Core. Potentially deprecate the existing `GetVersion` API in favor of these new methods.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add memo update feature
issues.author: KorDum
issues.summary: User requests the ability to update workflow memo during execution. Currently memos can only be set at workflow start, but the user needs to add dynamic metadata (like order numbers) during workflow execution for incident investigation.

issues.title: [Bug] Unrecognized date time interval format on unmarshalling
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: The PHP SDK fails to unmarshal DateInterval values during schedule operations, throwing 'Unrecognized date time interval format' when parsing the jitter field in ScheduleSpec.

issues.title: Ensure better SDK support in IDE
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Request for improved IDE support in the PHP SDK, including autocomplete for workflow types, classes, and methods in both client API and workflow contexts, as well as better type hints for untyped stubs.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to implement special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes in the PHP SDK, following the specification from the features repository.

issues.title: Check Harness and Acceptance test
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: The PHP SDK's Harness test for child workflow exception handling is failing with a timeout error when calling getResult(). The test expects an exception but instead encounters a 'Deadline Exceeded' timeout in the gRPC client.

issues.title: [Bug] Namespace from ClientOptions in ScheduleClient constructor not respected in createSchedule
issues.author: AleksandrKosovS
issues.summary: ScheduleClient does not respect the namespace specified in ClientOptions when creating schedules without explicit ScheduleOptions. Schedules are created in the default namespace instead of the configured namespace.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Access to workflow/activity instance from context
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to provide direct access to the Temporal-created workflow and activity instances from their respective contexts, enabling developers to interact with the instance objects directly rather than through the context abstraction alone.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Provide "workflow local"
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to implement workflow-local storage in PHP SDK - a static variable scoped to the current workflow execution, similar to thread-local or async-local patterns in other languages.

issues.title: [Bug] WorkflowClient throws type error when update method of untyped workflow stub is called
issues.author: pfy-oleksii-storozhylov
issues.summary: WorkflowClient throws a type error when calling the update method on an untyped workflow stub because the workflowType parameter is null for untyped workflows, but the mapUpdateWorkflowResponse method requires a non-nullable string.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Workflow logger
issues.author: cv65kr
issues.summary: Request to add workflow logging capability in PHP SDK, similar to functionality available in Java and other SDKs. Users need a standardized way to add logs within workflow classes.

issues.title: [Question] Asynchronous child workflow execution problem
issues.author: Muz4k
issues.summary: User struggling with asynchronous child workflow execution in PHP SDK where child workflows don't start executing before parent completes. Seeking equivalent of Java's pattern for waiting on child workflow promises.

issues.title: [Bug] cannot unmarshal array into Go struct field WorkerInfo.Flags of type map[string]string
issues.author: root-aza
issues.summary: PHP SDK worker initialization fails with unmarshaling error when using RoadRunner with Symfony Serializer data converter. The issue occurs in GetWorkerInfo.php due to missing preserve_empty_objects option in the serializer configuration.

issues.title: [Bug] Generators return null when exception is thrown
issues.author: IhorBerestPaybis
issues.summary: Generators that yield activities with exceptions return null instead of propagating the exception when called from private workflow methods, causing the workflow to complete instead of being cancelled. When the same code is inlined in the workflow method, exceptions propagate correctly.

issues.title: [Feature Request] registerDelayedCallback for tests
issues.author: cv65kr
issues.summary: Feature request to add registerDelayedCallback method for more efficient testing in PHP SDK, similar to implementations in other Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow mocking child workflows like activites
issues.author: KorDum
issues.summary: Feature request to allow mocking child workflows in tests, similar to how activities can be stubbed. User reports unexpected behavior when child workflows with timers are tested, suggesting child workflow mocking could help isolate and fix the issue.

issues.title: [Bug] [ErrorException] exclude_calendar is deprecated.
issues.author: sidorov89
issues.summary: Deprecated `exclude_calendar` field in ScheduleSpec causes ErrorException when creating a schedule with StartWorkflowAction. The issue was resolved by ensuring the PHP protobuf extension is installed.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support user metadata
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to support user metadata in PHP SDK by accepting optional static summary and details on workflow start operations, summary for timers and activities, and handling the __temporal_workflow_metadata query to align with Go SDK implementation.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Typed Search Attributes
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Feature request to implement typed search attributes in the PHP SDK, referencing a cross-SDK features discussion for consistency across all Temporal SDK implementations.

issues.title: [Bug]  proto_codec_parse_message Empty searchAttributes child workflow
issues.author: root-aza
issues.summary: Empty searchAttributes array passed to child workflow options causes a protobuf parsing panic in the Go SDK with error 'expected { character for map value'. The PHP SDK fails to properly serialize empty search attributes when creating child workflows.

issues.title: Show update handler and ID in logging context
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to include update handler and ID in logging context for better observability. An example implementation using interceptors is available in the samples.

issues.title: [Documentation] Message handler patterns
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Add documentation for message handler patterns in the PHP SDK, including sample code and coverage of HandlerUnfinishedPolicy, aligning with existing Python SDK documentation.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add  fallback Update/Signal/Query listeners
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Add support for fallback listeners for signals, queries, and updates with dynamically unknown names. Currently handlers must be declared with known names in advance.

issues.title: Eliminate DestructMemorizedInstanceException
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Remove DestructMemorizedInstanceException from the PHP SDK by improving cleanup of workflow context and promises during object destruction.

issues.title: UpdateWithStart SDK API
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to expose update-with-start operations through the PHP SDK. This feature allows combining workflow updates with workflow start operations, similar to functionality available in other Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: Fix test case
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: A test case in the Harness Schedule BasicTest intermittently fails in CI, with failures potentially related to the order or number of previously executed tests.

issues.title: Repair or disable Windows tests in CI
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Windows CI tests for the PHP SDK fail with exit code -1073741819 despite test logic passing, potentially related to improper termination of RoadRunner or Temporal CLI processes.

issues.title: [Bug] Got error `DataConverter is not set` when receiving an empty value
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: DataConverter error when receiving empty values with regular Workflow Stubs in PHP SDK. Previously reported issue #442 was not fully resolved for this use case.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Dynamic Update handler
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Request to support dynamic registration of Update methods similar to how Signals can be registered dynamically, rather than requiring them to be statically defined.

issues.title: [Discussion] Define a backwards compatibility promise
issues.author: Nyholm
issues.summary: Request to define and enforce a backwards compatibility promise for the PHP SDK, similar to Symfony's BC policy. Recent releases have introduced multiple BC breaks (signature changes, class moves, enum conversions) that make it difficult for downstream projects like Symfony bundles to maintain compatibility.

issues.title: Document next retry delay
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Add documentation and code sample for retrieving the next retry delay in the PHP SDK, following the pattern established in the Java SDK documentation.

issues.title: The SDK does not use TaskQueue when searching for the Workflow to be started.
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: The PHP SDK does not consider the TaskQueue when searching for workflows to start, potentially launching the wrong workflow class when multiple workflows with the same name are registered on different task queues.

issues.title: Workflow-init support
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Add a Workflow initialization method that's guaranteed to run before signals and updates, allowing handlers to access initialized values. The proposal is to implement a `getTypedInput()` method or constructor-based initialization to provide typed workflow arguments.

issues.title: Support WorkflowIdConflictPolicy for Signal-With-Start API
issues.author: stephanos
issues.summary: Request to support WorkflowIdConflictPolicy for the Signal-With-Start API in PHP SDK. Follow-up to adding this support to StartWorkflow API.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support schedule search attribute update
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for schedule search attribute updates in the PHP SDK, following the pattern established in the Go SDK and tracked in the cross-SDK features repository.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Cloud Operations API Client
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Add support for the Cloud Operations APIs to the PHP SDK, as described in the cross-SDK features issue. This extends PHP SDK capabilities to match other language implementations.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support "query" when listing schedules
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add query support when listing schedules in the PHP SDK, matching the functionality already available for listing workflows.

issues.title: Provide WorkflowId with StartWorkflowAction in Schedule API
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: The PHP SDK doesn't provide WorkflowId when using StartWorkflowAction in the Schedule API, causing Temporal to generate IDs based on empty values. This prevents parallel execution of different workflows started within the same second.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Accept search attributes in dev server startup
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to allow users to set search attributes during dev server startup in the PHP SDK, with the attributes translating to --search-attribute CLI calls.

issues.title: [Bug] ChildWorkflowStub should only send singnals using WorkflowID, not RunID
issues.author: wolfy-j
issues.summary: ChildWorkflowStub incorrectly caches RunID when sending signals to child workflows that have continued. When a child workflow continues, its RunID changes, but the stub still uses the old RunID, causing signal delivery to fail.

issues.title: Updates: retryable exceptions
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Update handlers should retry when they fail with retryable exceptions like RuntimeException, similar to activity retry behavior. A test case exists in the features repository to validate this behavior.

issues.title: Workflow-friendly concurrency control
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Need a deterministic, reentrant concurrency control mechanism (mutex/semaphore) suitable for PHP workflows that works across signal handlers, update handlers, and main workflow coroutines.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Minimal issue with only the word 'testing' as content. No actual problem description, feature request, or technical details provided.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Minimal issue with only the title 'Testing' and no body content. Appears to be a placeholder or incomplete submission.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Minimal issue with just the word 'testing' - appears to be a placeholder or incomplete submission with no actual problem statement or request described.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose `WorkflowStub::getUpdateHandle()` method
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Feature request to expose a `getUpdateHandle()` method on WorkflowStub to allow retrieval of update handles by update ID in the PHP SDK.

issues.title: Signal from signal-with-start must be processed before Workflow Handler initialization
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: The startWithSignal() method initializes the Workflow handler before processing signals, causing signals sent with signal-with-start to potentially be lost if the workflow's main method returns early. Signals must be processed before handler initialization to ensure they're not lost.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add new options into WorkerOptions
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Feature request to synchronize WorkerOptions in the PHP SDK with the current implementation in the Go SDK to ensure API parity and include new options.

issues.title: Add Binary Protobuf Converter into default set
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: The PHP SDK lacks support for decoding binary/protobuf encoded messages. A Binary Protobuf Converter needs to be added to the default converter set to enable decoding of these messages while maintaining JSON/protobuf as the default marshalling format.

issues.title: Encode Failures using EncodedAttributes
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: PHP SDK needs to encode failures using EncodedAttributes to pass the Harness test. The failure message should be encoded and stack trace should be empty.

issues.title: ContinueAsNew options dto doesn't inherit Workflow's Task Queue
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: ContinueAsNew options DTO doesn't inherit the Workflow's Task Queue by default, violating Temporal's documented behavior that continued workflows should run on the same compatible task queue as the original.

issues.title: Child Workflow doesn't inherit parent's Task Queue
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Child Workflow Executions in PHP SDK don't inherit the parent's Task Queue when one isn't explicitly provided, violating Temporal's documented inheritance behavior. The PHP SDK must explicitly send the parent's Task Queue to RoadRunner when a Child Workflow doesn't specify one.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: A testing-related issue with minimal description. The issue contains only the word 'testing' as its body, providing insufficient context about the specific problem or request.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: A minimal testing issue with no description or context provided.

issues.title: Expose UpdateID in an update handler
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Feature request to expose UpdateID in update handlers to allow users to access it for idempotent operations. The UpdateID is already available in the client, but needs to be accessible within the handler context in the workflow.

issues.title: Provide a method to wait for handlers to finish
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Add a method for workflows to wait for all handlers to complete before continuing as new or exiting. Users need explicit control over handler cleanup when transitioning workflow state.

issues.title: Warn or error when update handlers dangle across CAN or workflow exit
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: PHP SDK needs to warn or error when update handlers are not completed before workflow cancellation or exit. The feature implements a handler completion policy mechanism similar to Python SDK, allowing workflows to either wait for handlers to finish or receive warnings about unfinished handlers.

issues.title: [Bug] Can't run the tests according to documentation
issues.author: Dirst
issues.summary: User unable to run PHP SDK tests following the documentation; tests hang when executed. Issue resolved by adding missing `temporal` section to RoadRunner configuration.

issues.title: Expose shouldContinueAsNew in WorkflowInfo
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Request to expose the shouldContinueAsNew flag in the WorkflowInfo class for PHP SDK, allowing workflows to check if they should continue as new execution.

issues.title: Convert Policy constants into enum cases
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Convert Policy classes from PHP constants to enum cases for consistency with PHP 8.1+ and modern SDK code practices.

issues.title: Wrap GRPC::CANCELED and DEADLINE_EXCEEDED in an SDK Timeout exception for Update
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Wrap GRPC::CANCELED and DEADLINE_EXCEEDED errors in an SDK Timeout exception for Update operations so users only need to catch one predictable exception type.

issues.title: [Bug] Abstract Workflow not started
issues.author: root-aza
issues.summary: Child workflows cannot be started when using abstract classes with WorkflowMethod attributes. The PHP SDK fails to find the workflow method when the child workflow class extends an abstract class that defines the method.

issues.title: [Bug] Missing key mapping in ArrayType marsheller
issues.author: wolfy-j
issues.summary: ArrayType marshaller incorrectly handles string keys during unserialization. When serializing arrays with string keys, the keys are preserved but lost during deserialization due to improper key mapping in the ArrayType mapper.

issues.title: [Bug] Incorrect deadline verification in case of exception
issues.author: kkosowski-p
issues.summary: Deadline verification logic in BaseClient is reversed, causing incorrect timeout exceptions when ServiceClientException occurs. The comparison checks if deadline is before current time (should not trigger timeout) instead of after.

issues.title: [Bug] Unit test hangs with unit under test has runtime or compile time exception
issues.author: suityou01
issues.summary: Unit tests hang when the workflow under test encounters a runtime or compile-time exception. The test framework doesn't properly handle or surface exceptions that occur during workflow execution, causing the test to block indefinitely.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Make startUpdate users aware that it's synchronous w/ worker
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: The startUpdate method's documentation and API design don't adequately convey that it's synchronous with the worker, potentially misleading users into thinking it's asynchronous. The feature request asks for clearer documentation and/or API adjustments to make this behavior explicit.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add RpcRetryOption and use longer retry interval on RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Add RpcRetryOption DTO for PHP SDK client calls with support for RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED error handling and congestion-aware retry intervals, following the Java SDK pattern. RpcRetryOption should inherit from RetryOptions for backward compatibility.

issues.title: Expose defaultConnection() method to switch between localhost and cloud based on env
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Request to expose a defaultConnection() method that switches between localhost and cloud environments based on an environment variable, enabling easier cloud-based sample execution.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Divide Workflow stub objects and Workflow proxy objects
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Request to clarify the WorkflowClient API by distinguishing between Workflow Stub objects (typed interfaces) and Proxy objects (that implement user-defined Workflow interfaces). Currently, methods with 'Stub' postfix are inconsistent‚Äîsome return WorkflowStubInterface while others return proxies, creating confusion and limiting access to stub functionality.

issues.title: Support for WorkflowIdConflictPolicy
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Request to implement WorkflowIdConflictPolicy support in the PHP SDK, tracking feature parity with other Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose API to describe a Workflow
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Users need a way to check the status of running workflows in the PHP SDK. This feature request asks for a `describe()` method on workflow handles to expose workflow execution status, similar to other Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: [Feature Request] API key client option
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add a dedicated API key client option to the PHP SDK, matching the approach implemented in other SDKs like Go. Currently users can specify the Authorization header via metadata, but a dedicated ergonomic API would be more consistent across SDKs.

issues.title: [Bug] ArrayRepository always overwrites entries when adding
issues.author: edglev
issues.summary: ArrayRepository's add() method fails to check for duplicate entries correctly due to checking a non-existent array key with isset(), causing the overwrite parameter to be ignored and allowing duplicate activity/workflow names to be registered.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Update Carbon to 3.*
issues.author: Atantares
issues.summary: Update Carbon dependency from 2.x to 3.x to support Symfony 7 compatibility. Carbon 2.x requires Symfony 6 or lower, causing dependency conflicts for projects upgrading to Symfony 7.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose OperatorServiceClient
issues.author: shanginn
issues.summary: User requests exposure of the existing but unused OperatorServiceClient in the PHP SDK to enable namespace deletion functionality without reimplementing BaseClient.

issues.title: [Not a Bug] await doesn't interrupts on the activity with error
issues.author: pfy-oleksii-storozhylov
issues.summary: User reports that `awaitWithTimeout` doesn't immediately continue when a promise in `Promise::all()` rejects with an error; instead it waits for the full timeout interval. The issue was clarified to be expected behavior‚Äîrejected promises cause `all()` to reject, requiring explicit error handling.

issues.title: [Bug] LocalActivity behaves like a normal activity
issues.author: pfy-oleksii-storozhylov
issues.summary: LocalActivity in SDK 2.7 generates full activity events (ActivityTaskScheduled, ActivityTaskStarted, ActivityTaskCompleted) instead of a single MarkerRecorded event in workflow history, reverting to behavior like a normal activity.

issues.title: Expose next retry delay on Application Failure in all SDKs
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Expose the next retry delay field from ApplicationFailureInfo that was recently added to the API. This allows activities to specify custom retry delays on failure in the PHP SDK.

issues.title: Make "ext-grpc" a composer requirement
issues.author: dendemann
issues.summary: The gRPC PHP extension (ext-grpc) is a hard requirement for client operations but was not documented as a composer requirement, causing runtime errors when the extension wasn't installed. The issue requests adding it to composer.json to make the dependency explicit.

issues.title: Changing data type during deserialization
issues.author: windbridges
issues.summary: User reported that when deserializing DTO objects containing arrays of other DTO objects from activities, the nested objects were being converted to arrays instead of remaining as typed objects. The issue was resolved by using the MarshalArray attribute for proper type annotation support.

issues.title: [Bug] CronSchedule cannot be used because WorkflowStartDelay is always sent to server
issues.author: benkelukas
issues.summary: CronSchedule cannot be used in PHP SDK 2.7.2 because WorkflowStartDelay is always sent to the server, causing a rejection error. The Go SDK conditionally sends WorkflowStartDelay only when non-zero, but PHP SDK sends it on every request.

issues.title: [Bug] Failed hydrate null value
issues.author: root-aza
issues.summary: Activity method with nullable string parameter fails to deserialize null values during hydration. The data converter rejects null for a nullable parameter, throwing a type conversion exception.

issues.title: [Bug] Schedule API: Schedule creating without start and end time not working
issues.author: zemkogabor
issues.summary: Creating a Schedule without startTime and endTime fields throws a TypeError about Google\Protobuf\Timestamp. The API should allow optional start/end times, but currently fails when these fields are omitted from the ScheduleSpec.

issues.title: [Bug] Methods without ActivityMethod attribute are registered as Activities (even magic)
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Activity methods are incorrectly registered without requiring the ActivityMethod attribute, causing even constructors and magic methods to be included in the activity list. The issue proposes immediate removal of constructors and magic methods, with a planned feature flag to enforce attribute requirements.

issues.title: [Bug] Schedule API: Given value is not an instance of Google\Protobuf\Timestamp
issues.author: zemkogabor
issues.summary: Schedule API fails when creating a schedule with a cron expression due to a Protobuf Timestamp type mismatch. The error occurs in the ScheduleSpec when adding a cron string.

issues.title: Add PHP 8.3 in the CI
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Request to add PHP 8.3 support in the CI pipeline. The issue tracks updating the continuous integration configuration to test against PHP 8.3.

issues.title: Update google/common-protos to v4
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Update the google/common-protos dependency from v3 to v4 in the PHP SDK. This dependency upgrade addresses security and compatibility improvements provided by the newer version.

issues.title: [Bug] worker returns "Workflow with the specified run identifier.."
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Worker fails to query workflow executions with "Workflow with the specified run identifier not found" error in a small percentage of cases. The issue is resolved after restarting workers and was fixed in SDK version 2.6.1 with RoadRunner 2023.3.

issues.title: [Feature Request][PHP] Start delay
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Add an experimental `StartDelay` option to `StartWorkflowOptions` that causes Temporal to wait before dispatching the first workflow task. If the workflow receives a signal before the delay expires, the task is dispatched and the remaining delay is ignored.

issues.title: react/promise v3 doesn't work fine
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: react/promise v3 incompatibility causes unhandled promise rejections to trigger error_log calls with unpredictable side effects. The SDK cannot disable this behavior, and react/promise's handler mechanism is one-time rather than permanent, making the library unsuitable for async workflow coroutines until react/promise v3 is improved or a fork is created.

issues.title: [Interceptors] Remove DataConverter from header value object
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Remove the DataConverter requirement from header value objects in interceptors. Headers should be decoded on input and encoded only before sending, rather than requiring DataConverter dependency for header management.

issues.title: [Bug] Issue with Doctrine Annotation Reader and Need to Disable SelectiveReader`
issues.author: butschster
issues.summary: The Doctrine Annotations library fails to parse third-party classes like Carbon\Carbon that use @mixin annotations, causing crashes when SelectiveReader is used. The SDK checks for the presence of the Reader interface and defaults to using SelectiveReader, which tries to parse incompatible annotations.

issues.title: Add UUID sugar like Workflow::uuid()
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Add helper methods to generate UUIDs within workflows, supporting multiple versions (v4, v7, v8) like `Workflow::uuid()` or version-specific variants. Discussion centers on whether to provide a single generic method or allow users to choose specific UUID versions.

issues.title: [Maintenance] Update reactphp/promise to v3
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Update the PHP SDK dependency from reactphp/promise v2 to v3. The issue raises a question about whether v2.x should still be supported, which would require creating stubs for removed interfaces.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Define Workflow return type via attribute
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Feature request to define workflow return types via attributes in PHP SDK. Currently, workflow methods are limited by Generator type requirements and there's no way to unpack protobuf objects based on metadata.messageType headers.

issues.title: SideEffects: cast returned value based on callable return type
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: SideEffect callable's return type is not being respected; values are cast to string instead of the declared return type. The user expects a UuidInterface to be returned but receives a string.

issues.title: Add ability to pass UUID objects in arguments directly (not nested)
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Feature request to allow UUID objects to be passed directly as arguments in Temporal PHP SDK, rather than requiring them to be nested in other structures.

issues.title: [Feature Request] `EnableEagerStart` option in the  PHP `StartWorkflowOptions` structure
issues.author: rustatian
issues.summary: Add EnableEagerStart option to PHP SDK's StartWorkflowOptions to support Eager Workflow Dispatch (EWD), which minimizes latency from workflow start to first task processing. This feature is already available in SDK-GO v1.24.0 and needs to be implemented in the PHP SDK.

issues.title: Add an ability to set timeout for all client calls
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: PHP SDK client calls can hang indefinitely when the Temporal server is unreachable. The request is to add a `withTimeout()` method to the Workflow Client class to allow developers to set custom gRPC timeouts for client operations.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Separate client to another package
issues.author: peixotoleonardo
issues.summary: User requests separating the Temporal PHP SDK client into a standalone package that doesn't require RoadRunner as a dependency, as they only need the client functionality without worker capabilities.

issues.title: [Bug] DataConverter type named "null" is not a valid type name
issues.author: root-aza
issues.summary: DataConverter throws an exception when handling null return types in activity methods. The JsonConverter rejects 'null' as an invalid type name, causing failures when activities are declared to return null.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add friendly version of listWorkflowExecutions
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Add a friendly wrapper around listWorkflowExecutions that returns a lazy paginator, handling pagination automatically under the hood instead of requiring direct API calls.

issues.title: PHP Workflow update support
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add support for workflow updates in the PHP SDK by making the update handler registration interface publicly available, similar to the Go SDK implementation.

issues.title: Worker versioning support
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add support for worker versioning through the UpdateWorkerBuildIdCompatibility gRPC call. This allows workers to manage build ID compatibility sets for seamless deployments and versioning strategies.

issues.title: Improve PHP files generated from proto
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Proto-generated PHP files cause Psalm type-checking issues that could be resolved by adding PHP annotations like @psalm-mutation-free and @psalm-assert-if-true to generated getter and hasX methods.

issues.title: Support UUID in marshaller
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Add support for UUID objects in the PHP SDK marshaller. Currently users must manually cast UUID objects to strings when generating, passing in activities, or receiving as results.

issues.title: [Bug] Activity not scheduled in signal handler
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Activities scheduled within signal handlers sometimes fail to execute, causing the activity to not be scheduled after the signal is delivered. This results in event history mismatches and nondeterministic errors on replay.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow to register checksum with the worker
issues.author: manishrocksag
issues.summary: Feature request to add SetBinaryChecksum method to the PHP worker, allowing developers to register the binary checksum (e.g., git commit hash) with the worker for deployment rollback strategies.

issues.title: [Bug] PHP 8.2: ${var} string interpolation deprecated
issues.author: Gropaga
issues.summary: PHP 8.2 deprecated the ${var} string interpolation syntax in favor of {$var}. The Temporal PHP SDK uses the deprecated syntax, causing deprecation errors when running workflows on PHP 8.2.

issues.title: [Bug] Seeing a spike in CPU utilization in presence of the following error
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: CPU utilization spike observed when specific errors occur in the PHP SDK worker. The issue was resolved after upgrading from an outdated RoadRunner version to 2023.1.1, suggesting the spike was related to worker panic handling mechanisms.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Set the expectCompletion result for each Activity call inside the loop
issues.author: num213
issues.summary: ActivityMocker's expectCompletion() doesn't support setting different results for each activity call within a loop. Currently all calls return the same result or the entire result array is returned for each call, rather than individual results per iteration.

issues.title: Include protocol errors into retryable statements
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Protocol errors in the PHP SDK's GRPC client are not being retried, only service-level errors are. The issue requests that protocol errors be included in the retry logic for better resilience.

issues.title: [SWOOLE] Integration With Other Async PHP Libraries
issues.author: nickpoulos
issues.summary: User requests support for Swoole async library integration in the PHP SDK, currently limited to RoadRunner. The maintainer explains this would require porting all SDK code from Golang to C++ and maintaining two separate versions.

issues.title: Add API to count workflows
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add a dedicated CountWorkflowExecutions API to count workflows instead of relying on the listWorkflowExecutions paginator. This is a separate API call that needs to be exposed as a distinct endpoint in the PHP SDK.

issues.title: [Bug] Memory leak: Got the response to undefined request 9009 - autoclosed
issues.author: cv65kr
issues.summary: Worker reported memory leak with error "Got the response to undefined request" occurring in production. After investigation, the root cause was identified as misconfiguration: excessively high sticky cache size (15000) combined with PHP memory limit of 128MB, causing out-of-memory conditions rather than an actual SDK memory leak.

issues.title: [Bug] Fix compatibility with PHP 8.2
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: PHP SDK has multiple bugs when running with PHP 8.2, affecting both functional and unit tests across different dependency versions and Windows platform.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Do not require server CA cert in client createSSL
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: PHP SDK should accept null for CA certificate in SSL client creation, matching gRPC's behavior. Most production servers don't need CA override as they use system-level CAs or known CAs.

issues.title: Use temporal.download server to download `temporalite` or `temporal-test-sever`
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: The PHP SDK needs to implement a test server downloader that uses the temporal.download service to automatically download and extract temporalite or temporal-test-server binaries based on platform, architecture, and SDK version parameters.

issues.title: Add `EnumType` by default for PHP 8.1+
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: Request to add EnumType support by default for PHP 8.1 and later versions. This would leverage PHP 8.1's native enum feature to improve type safety in the SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Worker unable to start with a custom Data Converter
issues.author: sdellarosa
issues.summary: Worker fails to start when using a custom data converter that encrypts payloads. The worker cannot decode the encrypted workflow initialization payload, as the PHP SDK lacks support for custom payload encodings in the worker initialization process.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Unmarshalling of nested DTOs
issues.author: zlodes
issues.summary: Feature request to support nested DTOs (Data Transfer Objects) as workflow parameters. Currently, unmarshalling fails when a DTO contains another DTO as a property, causing a TypeError where stdClass is assigned instead of the expected DTO type.

issues.title: [Bug] PHP 8 named arguments don't work
issues.author: roxblnfk
issues.summary: PHP 8 named arguments are incorrectly handled when calling workflow handlers, causing parameters to be passed in the wrong order. When using named arguments like `handler(bar: true)`, the SDK sends all skipped default values instead of properly mapping named arguments to their corresponding parameters.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Use `mapWorkflowFailureToException` for all workflow methods ?
issues.author: ruscon
issues.summary: WorkflowStub methods except getResult don't properly map GRPC errors to Temporal exceptions. The cancel method and others throw generic ServiceClientException instead of domain-specific exceptions like WorkflowNotFoundException.

issues.title: Class Generator is an internal class marked as final that cannot be instantiated without invoking its constructor
issues.author: Neznaykas
issues.summary: Class Generator is marked as internal and final, preventing instantiation in nested child workflow scenarios. The issue occurs when deserializing workflow results that contain Generator instances returned from deeply nested child workflows.

issues.title: [Bug] Child async cancellation cancels the parent scope
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Child async cancellation incorrectly propagates to parent scope, preventing further operations like timers or activity calls. The parent scope becomes marked as cancelled after cancelling a child async, causing CancelFailure errors.

issues.title: [Bug] Async batch gets cancelled upon Exception thrown.
issues.author: Zylius
issues.summary: Async batch execution in PHP SDK v2 terminates prematurely when an exception is thrown within the batch scope, causing remaining activities to complete after the workflow finishes and resulting in UnhandledCommand errors. This differs from v1 behavior where the workflow waits for batch completion.

issues.title: [CHORE] Remove deprecated structure fields
issues.author: rustatian
issues.summary: Remove the deprecated WorkflowExecutionTimeout field from the ContinueAsNew request in the PHP SDK. This is a cleanup task to align with API deprecations tracked in the roadrunner-temporal project.

issues.title: Serialization don't support nullable array type
issues.author: roquie
issues.summary: Serialization fails when a DTO class has a nullable array property (?array). The marshaller throws an InvalidArgumentException when null is passed instead of properly handling the nullable type.

issues.title: [Feature Request] FailureConverter allow more context in ordinary exceptions
issues.author: zajca
issues.summary: Feature request to allow custom exception classes to carry failure context information when converted to Temporal failures. Currently, ApplicationFailure must be extended directly, but the user wants to implement an interface instead to preserve custom exception context like UserExceptions and ApplicationExceptions.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Extend `ServiceClient::createSSL()` to accept client certs and override server name
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Feature request to extend ServiceClient::createSSL() to accept client certificates and allow server name override using gRPC options (grpc.default_authority and grpc.ssl_target_name_override).

issues.title: [Bug] Parent workflow waits for child with abandon policy
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Parent workflow with POLICY_ABANDON child close policy incorrectly waits for child workflow completion instead of abandoning it. Using yield causes parent to block, while omitting yield prevents parent from starting.

issues.title: [Feature Request] How can i test child workflow?
issues.author: dehbka
issues.summary: User asks how to test child workflows in the PHP SDK, referencing the sample ParentWorkflow implementation. The question was redirected to Slack for community support.

issues.title: Expose raw grpc operator service in SDK client
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to expose the raw gRPC OperatorService client in the PHP SDK without requiring a high-level API wrapper.

issues.title: High level API for schedules
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request for a high-level API for scheduling workflows in the PHP SDK, following the pattern established in other Temporal SDKs like Go.

issues.title: Expose Replayer API
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Expose the Replayer API in the PHP SDK to allow users to replay workflow histories against new workflow code for non-determinism checking and local debugging, following the pattern already implemented in the Go SDK.

issues.title: OTEL tracing support
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add OpenTelemetry tracing support to the PHP SDK, built on top of interceptors. The functionality will be provided in a separate repository.

issues.title: [FEATURE REQUEST]: Add support for interceptors
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add support for interceptors to the PHP SDK for context propagation, authorization, and instrumentation use cases, following patterns from other Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: Lazy connectivity for Temporal client and healthCheck
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: SDK should support both lazy and eager connection modes for the Temporal client, with lazy connections avoiding server calls and eager connections validating connectivity. Additionally, expose a gRPC health check method for users who need it.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Use getSystemInfo request to determine server capabilities
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to use getSystemInfo request in the PHP SDK to determine server capabilities, allowing runtime detection of server features.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose history length via Workflow info
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Feature request to expose workflow history length through the Workflow info object in the PHP SDK, allowing developers to access the current history size during workflow execution.

issues.title: Ensure SDK does not retry "internal" errors
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Ensure the PHP SDK does not retry 'internal' errors that should not be retried according to gRPC error classification. Review and update the retryable client error codes list.

issues.title: Send sdk-name and sdk-version headers from worker
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: The PHP SDK worker needs to send sdk-name and sdk-version headers in gRPC requests, similar to what the PHP client already does. This requires implementing gRPC interceptors to override headers sent by the underlying SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add API reference
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Feature request for a structured API reference for the PHP SDK. The user requested an organized list of functions and APIs provided by the package, with the discussion leading to implementation of phpdoc-based documentation and deployment to php.temporal.io.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Ability to use readonly properties in workflow and activity inputs.
issues.author: kafkiansky
issues.summary: Feature request to support readonly properties in workflow and activity input objects. Currently, properties must be set individually after object creation, which is incompatible with readonly fields.

issues.title: [Bug] Order of declaration async tasks completely change the execution flow of Workflow
issues.author: LikDioxo
issues.summary: Async task declaration order in PHP SDK workflows affects execution flow incorrectly. When tasks are declared in different orders, a workflow's main async task may be rejected instead of completing successfully, depending on the order of nested async declarations.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow shouldn't wait for activities unless it is explicitly said with yield
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Workflow methods in PHP SDK execute activities synchronously even when not yielded, causing workflows to block waiting for activity completion despite not using the result. Activities should only execute when explicitly yielded in the workflow.

issues.title: [Bug] param type hints in signal method
issues.author: eriklotin
issues.summary: Signal methods with type hints for associative arrays fail because Temporal converts arrays to stdClass objects, but stdClass cannot be used as a parameter type hint. The workaround is to remove the type hint, which defeats the purpose of type safety.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add time management for test server
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Request to add time management interface for PHP test server, including time skipping, sleep functionality, and current time retrieval capabilities.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Package is locked to Symfony 5
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: The PHP SDK is locked to Symfony 5, but needs to support Symfony 4, 5, and 6 versions to provide broader compatibility with different projects.

issues.title: [Bug] Timeout continues with cancelled tasks
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: When cancelling a workflow coroutine that contains an `awaitWithTimeout()` call, execution incorrectly continues to subsequent async tasks after the timeout is cancelled, instead of respecting the cancellation and stopping.

issues.title: [Bug] Async cancellation doesn't cancel internal timers
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Cancelling an async workflow closure with an internal timer doesn't properly cancel the timer, causing the workflow to hang indefinitely instead of finishing.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add ability to check by id whether the workflow is running or not
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: User requests a dedicated method to check if a workflow is running by ID without having to catch exceptions. Currently, the only way is to attempt getting a running workflow stub and catching WorkflowException if it fails.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Send client info to Temporal via GRPC calls
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: PHP SDK does not send client info (SDK version) to Temporal via gRPC calls, preventing SDK usage metrics collection. Other SDKs already implement this feature, and the PHP SDK should support customizable client info similar to other SDKs.

issues.title: [Bug] Abandoned child workflow don't release flow
issues.author: koekaverna
issues.summary: Parent workflow waits for child workflow completion even when no result is yielded, preventing the parent from returning immediately after the child starts. This blocks scenarios where child workflows should execute independently without blocking the parent.

issues.title: [Bug] Small bugs in EncodedValues
issues.author: mzavatsky
issues.summary: Two bugs found in EncodedValues: incorrect null value decoding and incorrect named argument encoding in workflows.

issues.title: [Question] Kubernetes pod scaling
issues.author: corelix
issues.summary: User asks about scaling PHP SDK workers across multiple Kubernetes pods in different AWS zones. Concern about RoadRunner's internal process orchestration and potential issues with pod scaling.

issues.title: [Bug] Got the response to undefined request due to the memory leak in the WF worker
issues.author: corelix
issues.summary: Child worker process throws panic error "Got the response to undefined request" due to memory leak in the PHP SDK's WF worker. The issue occurs when workflows exceed cache limits and are not properly offloaded from memory, causing request tracking to become corrupted.

issues.title: composer require fail because of an old version of `psr/log`
issues.author: danyelkeddah
issues.summary: The SDK was using an old version of psr/log (^1.1) causing dependency conflicts with packages requiring psr/log 2.0 or 3.0. This prevented users from installing the SDK alongside other packages with newer PSR-3 logging requirements.

issues.title: Process execution does not continue after await condition is satissfied (through signals)
issues.author: jcontesse
issues.summary: Workflow execution sometimes fails to continue after an await condition with signals is satisfied, causing the workflow to hang indefinitely even after resending signals. The issue appears intermittently in production (~10% of cases) and couldn't be replicated in development environments.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow getVersion method return wrong type
issues.author: xtix
issues.summary: The Workflow::getVersion() method returns an EncodedValues object instead of the expected integer type, causing type comparisons to fail. Users must manually decode the result using EncodedValues::decodePromise() as a workaround.

issues.title: [Bug] Issues with sticky execution/queries/signals
issues.author: mzavatsky
issues.summary: After worker restart, sticky execution queries and signals become unstable, causing workflow processes to be unavailable and signal handlers not to execute properly. The issue was caused by a RoadRunner version incompatibility and was resolved by updating to RR v2.10.3 and SDK v1.3.2.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow timer debouncing does not work
issues.author: OlegKuro
issues.summary: Workflow timer debouncing fails when attempting to cancel and re-launch timers in response to signals. The workflow gets stuck in Running state instead of properly resetting the timer, causing roadrunner errors about undefined requests.

issues.title: [Bug] Parent workflow waits for child completion
issues.author: OlegKuro
issues.summary: Parent workflow was incorrectly waiting for child workflow completion when using POLICY_ABANDON parent close policy. The parent should only wait for the child to start, then complete independently while the child continues execution.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow is always Running
issues.author: OlegKuro
issues.summary: Workflow hangs indefinitely when using Workflow::await() with Promise::all() and a callback condition. The issue stems from missing yield keywords and misunderstanding of when Workflow::async() requires yield in the PHP SDK.

issues.title: PHP docs reference wrong function or wrong class
issues.author: the-invisible-man
issues.summary: PHP documentation for WorkerInterface::registerActivity() incorrectly references ReflectionClass::getClass() method, which doesn't exist in the native PHP ReflectionClass. The correct method should be getName().

issues.title: Use test server in testing framework
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Integrate test server into the PHP SDK testing framework, similar to implementations in Java and TypeScript SDKs. This would provide a standardized way to test Temporal workflows without requiring a full server setup.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Implement finalizer to clear resource after activity invocation
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Add a finalizer mechanism to clean up resources after activity invocation, building on the stateless activities implementation.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Implement routes for handling local activity
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Feature request to implement two new routes for handling local activities in the PHP SDK: ExecuteLocalActivity and RequestCancelLocalActivity, with corresponding handlers on the RoadRunner side.

issues.title: [Bug] Wrong PHP doc
issues.author: butschster
issues.summary: PHPDoc type hints are incorrectly specified for typed arguments in ServiceContainer, causing Psalm static analysis to fail with type mismatch errors.

issues.title: [Bug] Cannot decode value using Protobuf converter when fetching previous workflow result
issues.author: benkelukas
issues.summary: Protobuf messages returned from CRON scheduled workflows cannot be decoded when fetching previous results via Workflow::getLastCompletionResult(). The issue was resolved by explicitly declaring the return type using the #[ReturnType] attribute.

issues.title: [Bug?] Workflow not completing unless all async coroutines finish or are cancelled manually
issues.author: benalf
issues.summary: Workflows remain in running state until all async coroutines complete or are manually cancelled, even after the workflow reaches a return/exception condition. This is intended behavior but can be inconvenient when managing long-running activities with async completion.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add metadata.messageType to protobuf payloads
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Add metadata.messageType field to protobuf payloads in PHP SDK to match Java and Go SDK implementations. This requires accessing the protobuf message's full name/type information.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow with awaitWithTimeout keeps running after signal
issues.author: mzavatsky
issues.summary: The awaitWithTimeout workflow utility does not immediately resume when the condition becomes true; instead, it waits for the full timeout duration to elapse before checking again. This causes workflows to hang until the timeout expires rather than responding promptly to signal-triggered state changes.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow keeps stuck with awaitWithTimeout and signal
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Workflow with awaitWithTimeout and signal handlers exhibits timing issues where timeout completion doesn't trigger properly when signals are sent, causing workflows to remain stuck until the opposite condition occurs.

issues.title: [Bug] Activity code is not invoked inside await
issues.author: seregazhuk
issues.summary: Activity code sometimes fails to execute when the same activity method is called multiple times with different arguments inside a workflow, despite showing as completed in history. Workaround is to use different method names for each activity call.

issues.title: [Bug] No way to setNamespace for a worker to make worker listen for queue in namespace
issues.author: oss92
issues.summary: PHP SDK workers cannot be configured to listen to a specific namespace, only to the default namespace. This prevents workers from processing tasks in non-default namespaces when clients are created with different namespace options.

issues.title: Add "listQueries" built-in query
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add a built-in "listQueries" query capability to the PHP SDK, tracking the feature request from the cross-SDK features issue.

issues.title: [Bug] withEnableSessionWorker causes to ActivityNotRegisteredError
issues.author: mixadior
issues.summary: When a PHP worker is started with session support enabled via `withEnableSessionWorker(true)`, user-registered activities cannot be found and cause ActivityNotRegisteredError. Only internal session activities are visible to the workflow.

issues.title: [Bug] After countinueAsNew awaitWithTimeout doesn't check for condition
issues.author: mixadior
issues.summary: After workflow restart via continueAsNew, awaitWithTimeout condition evaluation fails and waits for the full timeout instead of detecting when the condition becomes true. The await predicate appears to not be re-evaluated after workflow continuation.

issues.title: [Question] activity_schedule_to_start_latency metrics
issues.author: shineirvin
issues.summary: User inquires about the availability of activity_task_schedule_to_start_latency metrics in the PHP SDK, expecting it to be present since the PHP SDK is built on top of the Go SDK which implements these metrics.

issues.title: [Bug] Wrong activity response type
issues.author: xepozz
issues.summary: Activity returning associative arrays are deserialized as stdClass objects instead of arrays in workflow promises, causing type errors when accessing array values. The issue stems from JSON deserialization behavior that treats associative arrays as objects.

issues.title: [Bug] Wrong exception trace
issues.author: xepozz
issues.summary: Stack trace from workflow failures shows incorrect line numbers pointing to the workflow method call site instead of the actual activity method invocation, and the correct stack trace is stored in an inaccessible originalStackTrace property rather than the standard trace property.

issues.title: Use DateInterval instead of Carbon
issues.author: xepozz
issues.summary: Feature request to replace Carbon library with DateInterval for better performance. Discussion reveals Carbon is only used internally and public APIs already use standard DateTimeInterface and DateInterval, making the replacement feasible.

issues.title: [Bug] Parent workflow not completed or failed, when start child workflow execution failed
issues.author: khoerintus
issues.summary: Parent workflow gets stuck in running state when starting a child workflow fails due to the child workflow ID already existing. The parent workflow should either complete or fail, but instead remains indefinitely in running state until timeout.

issues.title: [Question] Arrays not allowed as a return type?
issues.author: Zylius
issues.summary: User asked why arrays cannot be used as return types in activity methods. The limitation exists because PHP lacks generic type hints for composite types, and JSON's lack of hash maps creates ambiguity in type serialization.

issues.title: [Question] Workflow DI
issues.author: Zylius
issues.summary: User asks how to inject configuration into workflow constructors, as workflows must be instantiated without arguments. Discussion reveals workflows must be deterministic and suggests using signals, activities, or side-effects for dependency injection.

issues.title: [Question] Injecting custom reader into worker factory.
issues.author: Zylius
issues.summary: User requests ability to inject a custom reader into WorkerFactory to support gradual migration from legacy annotation-based workflow/activity registration to Temporal attributes. Current implementation uses final classes, preventing subclassing and customization.

issues.title: [Question] When waiting for signal, is there a way to specify a timeout settings ?
issues.author: changwuf31
issues.summary: User asks whether PHP SDK supports timeout settings when waiting for signals in workflows. The question is resolved by pointing to the awaitWithTimeout function.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow type is messed when using `continueAsNew`
issues.author: kozlice
issues.summary: When using `continueAsNew` to restart a workflow, the workflow type name is incorrectly passed as a fully-qualified class name instead of the registered short name, causing the worker to fail with 'unable to find workflow type' errors.

issues.title: [Bug] Activity RetryOptions Maximum Interval sets the initial interval
issues.author: Rastusik
issues.summary: A bug in the RetryOptions setter where the maximum interval parameter incorrectly sets the initial interval instead. This causes incorrect retry behavior for activities.

issues.title: [Bug] Namespace not being propagated into ChildWorflowOptions, but probably should be (according to comments)
issues.author: Rastusik
issues.summary: Child workflows are not automatically inheriting the parent workflow's namespace, requiring manual propagation despite documentation suggesting it should work automatically. This breaks custom namespace configurations until explicitly passed through ChildWorkflowOptions.

issues.title: [Question] Sentry Integration for error logging
issues.author: khoerintus
issues.summary: User seeks best practices for integrating Sentry error logging with Temporal PHP SDK, asking whether a global error handler exists to catch errors from workflows and activities, or if integration with RoadRunner is possible.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Implement GetSearchAttributesRequest
issues.author: Rastusik
