issues.summary: Request to implement GetSearchAttributesRequest in PHP SDK to enable programmatic workflow and activity search similar to Java SDK. User needs this for writing integration tests that check workflow states without relying on shell commands.

issues.title: [Bug] PHP 7.4 docblock anotations don't work (or documentation missing?)
issues.author: Rastusik
issues.summary: PHP 7.4 docblock annotations were not recognized by the SDK, which only supported PHP 8 attributes. The client would throw an error claiming the required attribute was missing even when using docblock-style annotations that should be compatible with the minimum supported PHP 7.4 version.

issues.title: [Bug] Non-retryable exceptions list in RetryOptions does not work as expected
issues.author: kozlice
issues.summary: RetryOptions' non-retryable exceptions list doesn't work due to incorrect type checking logic. The code uses `instanceof` on class name strings instead of `is_subclass_of()`, causing assertion errors when retrying non-retryable exceptions.

issues.title: Integration issue with Laravel
issues.author: tank-pooja
issues.summary: User unable to access Laravel facades inside Temporal workflows and activities due to missing facade context. Received RuntimeException when attempting integration with Laravel 8.x.

issues.title: [Bug] Activity return an associative array, but in workflow, the return value is parsed as an object
issues.author: khoerintus
issues.summary: Activity methods returning PHP associative arrays are deserialized as stdClass objects in workflows, causing 'Cannot use object as array' errors. Users need to explicitly cast the result back to an array or use DTOs instead.

issues.title: Hide unused files
issues.author: SerafimArts
issues.summary: Remove unnecessary files from the PHP SDK composer package before release to reduce package size and distribution footprint. Files like tests, build configuration, and development tools should be excluded.

issues.title: Improve service container
issues.author: SerafimArts
issues.summary: The service container and worker factory classes need to be rewritten with a clearer, more user-friendly approach, potentially using PSR-11 standard. This refactoring should address design issues and consider that these services are also used in the client.

issues.title: upsert Search Attribute
issues.author: changwuf31
issues.summary: Request to add upsert Search Attribute functionality to the PHP SDK. The team confirmed this would be implemented after the release as a quick addition.

issues.title: about connection refuse in tcp://127.0.0.1:6001
issues.author: ru90
issues.summary: User unable to establish a connection to the Temporal Server at tcp://127.0.0.1:6001 when attempting to execute workflows. This was an early adoption issue during the PHP SDK beta phase before official release and documentation were available.

issues.title: DTO Java/Go comparison
issues.author: SerafimArts
issues.summary: PHP SDK needs DTO comparison and alignment with Java/Go SDKs. Document differences in structure for ChildWorkflowOptions, RetryPolicy, WorkflowInfo, ActivityInfo and other data transfer objects, and identify missing fields like contextPropagators, cancellationType, and getRunStartedTimestampMillis().

issues.title: Cancellation Scopes
issues.author: SerafimArts
issues.summary: Implement cancellation scopes functionality for the PHP SDK, including support for nested scopes, hierarchical cancellation, and comprehensive testing of cancellation behavior across various scenarios.

issues.title: example project not invoking activity
issues.author: ashish-s
issues.summary: User unable to invoke activities in the example project because StartActivity is not yet implemented in the early-stage PHP SDK.

issues.title: Is the WorkflowClient going to available in the php sdk soon?
issues.author: arengarajan
issues.summary: User asks if WorkflowClient will be available in PHP SDK soon. After maintainer clarification, the feature exists (called Worker due to different execution strategy) and examples are available in samples-php repository.

issues.title: Is this SDK available in standalone without RoadRunner ?
issues.author: lerminou
issues.summary: User asks whether the PHP SDK can work standalone without RoadRunner for launching workflows and receiving activities. Initial attempts to connect directly to Temporal server fail with protocol errors.
